'''Detective Rollins''' came to Violet's house to investigate the stabbing death of [[David Gibbs]].

==History==
Detective Rollins came to the house when [[Joanna Gibbs]] killed her husband, [[David Gibbs]]. He interviewed Violet about what happened and Violet told him the stabbing was self-defense, despite not personally witnessing it.

==Career==
He is a detective in Los Angeles.
